This review is base on carry out experience  multiple times. It goes to the point that it makes me think every time I walk in it seems to be a bother asking for prices menu inquiries etc. I hope the service and greeting improve and keep in mind that there are many choices of similar food at just walking distance that provides with better customer treatment.

Fyi; this is only from my own experience nothing personal. I only visit this place when I'm around the area.

Nice food, but I've had better. Terrible customer service. As a Bronx native, I find that  a lot of these establishments, (especially in the BX), can care less about how they service you when you don't share the same heritage. Smh. Waste of money.

Delicious! Whenever I'm in the Fordham section of the Bronx, I make it my business to eat lunch.  My go to is the pernil, but it's all good! The food is always fresh, the restaurant is always clean and the service is prompt and friendly. Thanks!
